sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Macedonian: Воениот плач за правда беше многу повеќе - многу на шагринот на властите.
backtrans: The military crying for justice was much more - much of the clinge of the authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Macedonian: Одлуката на режимот ја опфаќа основната агенда.
backtrans: The regime's decision covers the basic agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Macedonian: Заедницата беше вознемирена поради донесувањето на многу потребните реформи.
backtrans: The community was upset over the adoption of much needed reforms.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Macedonian: Тинк-тенк објави хартија во кој се извинува нивното извинување на смртната казна.
backtrans: Think tank published a paper in which their apology is sorry for the death penalty.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
backtrans: Went from the validity of the petition

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Macedonian: Претседателот ги поттикна своите министри за да ја завршат како клучна поддршка за опозицијата за неговиот економски план за да се зафати.
backtrans: The President prompted his ministers to complete her as a key support for the opposition for his economic plan to engage.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Macedonian: Гласачите беа издигнати за да ја видат законот.
backtrans: Voters were raised to see the law.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
Macedonian: Дискурзивната нарација на адвокатот го замагли жирито.
backtrans: The discursive narration of the lawyer blurred the jury.

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Macedonian: Блокот на ЕУ се спротивстави на евентуално наметнување на анти-дампинг мерки.
backtrans: The EU bloc has opposed possible imposition of anti-dumping measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Macedonian: Fulsome Eulogy беше испорачана од страна на Slyware.
backtrans: Fulsome eulogy was delivered by Slyware.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Macedonian: Агенцијата за економија на свирката одлучи да ги организира надоместоците!
backtrans: The whistle agency decided to organize fees!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Macedonian: Членовите на анти-теосторачкото револуционерно движење ги соборија врсниците на власт!
backtrans: Members of the anti-theological revolutionary movement broke peers in power!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
Macedonian: На предавниците разочарувачки одлучија да се борат со колонијалистите.
backtrans: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight colonialists.
